source:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Rhil Ril has stumbled upon something rather intriguing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ガリク村のリールリルは、冒険者に宝探しをしてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_TODO_00<tab>Use the rusty spade to dig at the designated location.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rotted chest to Rhil Ril and return his rusty spade.
target: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_TODO_01<tab>リールリルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDA01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_000<tab>You must be a traveler, yes? Then maybe you can help me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_000<tab>あんた、旅人ネ？
面白い話あるけど、聞いてくネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_001<tab>I was looking around an abandoned house and I found a map of Amh Araeng, with a big cross drawn on it. It can only mean one thing─treasure!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_001<tab>ヒトが退去した空き家を整理してたら、
奇妙な印が付けられた、この辺りの地図を見つけたネ。
もしかしたら宝の地図かもネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_002<tab>I want to go and look for it, but I have to stay here and guard the village. Could you go in my stead?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_002<tab>だけど、俺は見張りのため、ここを離れられないネ……。
そこで旅慣れた旅人さんに、地図の場所へ行ってもらいたいネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_003<tab>If there are any shinies to be had, we can share them, yes? Here, take my spade and dig where the cross is!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_003<tab>もし本当に宝の地図だったら、山分けネ！
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDA01 /var>」を渡すから、
地図の場所、掘ってくるネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_010<tab>Be sure to bring the treasure to me, along with my spade! You do not want to know what happens to thieves around here...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDA01 /var>」で、
地図の場所、掘ってくるネ！
宝が出たら山分けヨ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You discover a rotted chest buried in the soil.
target: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>土の中から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDB01 /var>を発見した！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_030<tab>Show me what you found! Show me! And give me my spade back, please!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_030<tab>おかえりネ。
宝は見つかったネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_031<tab>Oh, this must be very old... Let us see what is inside...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_031<tab>おお、地図の場所にこの箱が埋まっていたネ！
さっそく開けてみるヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_032<tab>What!? Nothing but junk! Rusty junk, at that! Why would anyone bury this? Wait, is that a diary? I am sure the former owner will not mind if I take a peek...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_032<tab>……中身はガラクタだけネ。
お金になるようなもの、入ってないヨ。
それと、これは日記ネ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_033<tab>Hmm... It looks like the owner had to leave Amh Araeng but was planning to come back one day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_033<tab>どれどれ……ふむふむ……。
アム・アレーン離れるの寂しいとか、
いつかこの地に帰ってきたいとか、書いてあるネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_034<tab>And if that day ever came, they wanted to dig up the diary and continue writing their life story.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_034<tab>それと、元気なうちに帰ってこれたら、
この日記を掘り返して、続きを書きたい、だそうネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_035<tab>I wonder if that person is still alive... Probably not, judging by the state of this chest. It must have been buried for a long time. Maybe their children, or their children's children will come in search of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_035<tab>もし、アム・アレーンに活気が戻ってきたら、
この日記を書いたヒト、きっと戻ってくるヨ。
子ども、あるいは孫かもしれないけどネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_036<tab>If I read the rest, maybe I can learn who this person was... And then I will put it back, in a more sturdy box. And since there was no treasure to share, I will give you this instead as payment for your hard work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_036<tab>それまで日記と、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8EDB01 /var>は、俺が預かるネ。
旅人、ありがとネ！
ちょっとだけだけど、報酬も受け取ってヨ！
